CustomField.inlineHelpText: If 'Payable' is selected, then the Source field on Cash Disbursements created from the 'Pay' or 'Pay Batch' will be set to 'Payable'. If 'Manual' is selected, then the Source field on CDs created from the 'Pay' or 'Pay Batch' will be set to 'Manual' and the 'reverse apply' behavior will be invoked. Refer to the Knowledge Base article "Create a Manual Cash Disbursement" for more information on the "reverse apply" behavior for CDs where the Source field = Manual.
CustomField.label: CD Source for Accrual Ledgers
